On Friday, November 14, 2003, at 9:13:58 AM, Kevin O'Sullivan wrote:

>>>Yes, it does.  Quick question.  How many lines does that method have?

> 200 lines.

The method in question is not cohesive. If you wrote it, I would suggest
starting over.
